entry._comment: used if result of breach is from organizational insider
used if result of breach was due to system or app misconfiguration
used if result of breach was result of supply chain compromise
used if result of breach was due to ransomware
used if result of breach was due to social engineering attach on organization
used if result of breach was due to unauthorized access to the data by a third party
used if result of breach was due to malware infection of organizational systems
